actions.name: CreateChatToken
actions.description: Grants permission to create an encrypted token that is used to establish an individual WebSocket connection to a room

actions.name: CreateLoggingConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to create a logging configuration that allows clients to record room messages

actions.name: CreateRoom
actions.description: Grants permission to create a room that allows clients to connect and pass messages

actions.name: DeleteLoggingConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the logging configuration for a specified logging configuration ARN

actions.name: DeleteMessage
actions.description: Grants permission to send an event to a specific room which directs clients to delete a specific message

actions.name: DeleteRoom
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the room for a specified room ARN

actions.name: DisconnectUser
actions.description: Grants permission to disconnect all connections using a specified user ID from a room

actions.name: GetLoggingConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to get the logging configuration for a specified logging configuration ARN

actions.name: GetRoom
actions.description: Grants permission to get the room configuration for a specified room ARN

actions.name: ListLoggingConfigurations
actions.description: Grants permission to get summary information about logging configurations

actions.name: ListRooms
actions.description: Grants permission to get summary information about rooms

actions.name: ListTagsForResource
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about the tags for a specified ARN

actions.name: SendEvent
actions.description: Grants permission to send an event to a room

actions.name: TagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to add or update tags for a resource with a specified ARN

actions.name: UntagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to remove tags for a resource with a specified ARN

actions.name: UpdateLoggingConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to update the logging configuration for a specified logging configuration ARN

actions.name: UpdateRoom
actions.description: Grants permission to update the room configuration for a specified room ARN
